TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 372
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to R R Royall, 04-27-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin and R. R. Royall, April 27, 1830. Agreement for the settlement of four families. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 372

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin and R. R. Royall, April 27, 1830. Agreement for the settlement of four families. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Agreement, April 27, 1830: Royall is to introduce three families besides his own and Austin is to receive them as colonists and grant them land for the usual fees.]*/p*
*/div1*
